pakaza.name: Thorn Whip
pakaza.description: Summons sharp magical thorns that pierce through the target's defenses
pakaza.cast_message: {caster} weaves natural magic, summoning sharp thorns at {target}!
pakaza.hit_message: The thorns pierce through armor for {damage} piercing damage!

toraza.name: Stone Missile
toraza.description: Commands the earth to hurl a razor-sharp stone shard at the target
toraza.cast_message: {caster} commands the earth, launching a sharp stone shard at {target}!
toraza.hit_message: The stone shard strikes with brutal force for {damage} damage!

modoki.name: Lightning Bolt
modoki.description: Calls down a crackling bolt of lightning from the sky
modoki.cast_message: {caster} calls to the storm, directing a bolt of lightning at {target}!
modoki.hit_message: The lightning bolt crackles through the air for {damage} lightning damage!

sivama.name: Gust of Wind
sivama.description: Summons a powerful gust of wind that batters the target
sivama.cast_message: {caster} summons the fury of the wind, blasting {target} with a powerful gust!
sivama.hit_message: The violent wind slams into {target} for {damage} force damage!

pakazuma.name: Spike Growth
pakazuma.description: Unleashes a shower of wicked thorns that rain down upon the target
pakazuma.cast_message: {caster} channels primal energy, raining wicked thorns down on {target}!
pakazuma.hit_message: A shower of thorns tears through flesh for {damage} piercing damage!

torazuma.name: Stone Shower
torazuma.description: Causes a shower of stone shards to erupt from the earth and strike the target
torazuma.cast_message: {caster} raises their hands, causing stone shards to erupt toward {target}!
torazuma.hit_message: The stone shards bombard {target} relentlessly for {damage} force damage!

modokidan.name: Call Lightning
modokidan.description: Calls down several forked bolts of lightning that strike all enemies in the area
modokidan.cast_message: {caster} raises their staff to the sky, calling down forked lightning on all foes!
modokidan.hit_message: Lightning forks across the battlefield for {damage} lightning damage!

sivadaku.name: Whirlwind
sivadaku.description: Conjures a violent windstorm that tears through all enemies
sivadaku.cast_message: {caster} unleashes the fury of nature, creating a violent windstorm!
sivadaku.hit_message: The windstorm tears through all enemies for {damage} force damage!

modokidaku.name: Storm of Vengeance
modokidaku.description: Summons a devastating lightning storm that electrifies all enemies
modokidaku.cast_message: {caster} commands the storm itself, unleashing a devastating lightning storm!
modokidaku.hit_message: Lightning crashes down repeatedly for {damage} lightning damage!

toradaku.name: Earthquake
toradaku.description: Commands the earth to rain down a hail of huge stone shards upon all foes
toradaku.cast_message: {caster} channels the raw power of the earth, raining massive stone shards!
toradaku.hit_message: Huge stone shards pummel all enemies for {damage} force damage!
